column4: Is there a way for me to transfer files from my laptop which has ubuntu to the family pc that has windows vista?
oh ok. Thank you. Also is there a way to install windows xp on a partition and share some of the media like music that i have with ubuntu on the other partition that has windows?
-> you can have putty running scp in windows to securely download the files from ubuntu, but that does not mean you can easily use the files in windows format
